[upstream]
providers = [
    "cloud.google.com"
]


[org]
credentials = [
    { domain = 'siteground.com', doctype = 'web-page', url = "https://cloud.google.com/customers/siteground" },
    { domain = 'siteground.com', doctype = 'web-page', url = "https://www.siteground.com/blog/moving-to-google-cloud"},
]
